text:
After The Crazy Trailer Of 2.0 Was Released, It’s Raining Jokes & Memes On Social Media
After The Crazy Trailer Of 2.0 Was Released, It’s Raining Jokes & Memes On Social Media
The much-awaited trailer of 2.0 starring Akshay Kumar and Rajinikanth was released a couple of days ago, and it seems it is going to be the craziest superhero movie of the year.
There has been a lot of buzz around it, especially because it involves years of hard work. Furthermore, the fact that it has been made on a budget of Rs 600 crores is making people look forward to it even more.
Screengrab
However, after the trailer was out, in no time, it inspired a meme-fest on Twitter. From slamming its visual effects to comparing it to MSG, fans couldn’t stop wondering what all the fuss was about. If you haven’t yet watched the trailer, you can watch it below.
Don't Miss 282 SHARES 117 SHARES
And so, another trailer became a butt of jokes!

indian mom's right now pic.twitter.com/X3d9NFcZHl — abhay (@Abhays03) November 3, 2018
The movie is all set to be released on November 29.
title: After The Crazy Trailer Of 2.0 Was Released, It’s Raining Jokes & Memes On Social Media
description: The much-awaited trailer of 2.0 starring Akshay Kumar and Rajinikanth was released a couple of days ago and it seemed it was going to be the craziest superhero movie of the year for Bollywood.
